data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe a famous scientist or artist from your country.
data.answer: Jay Chou has been recognized as one of the most successful and influential Asian entertainers for his outstanding achievements in the Chinese music scene. Having sold more than 30 million albums, Chou is one of the best-selling artists in Mainland China. In 2000, Chou released his first album and rose to fame with the release of his second studio album, Fantasy. The album won five Golden Melody Awards, including Album of the Year. It is from there, people started to notice his talent in music composition. Chou's compositions are loosely categorized as pop music. While many of his works fall into contemporary R&B, rap, and rock genres, the term "Chou Style" has been popularized to describe his trademark cross-cultural music and insistence on singing with slurred enunciation. I came to know him when I was in primary school. My schoolmate played his songs every night. That was the year Chou started to become famous. (154字)

options.content: How would you describe their work?
How do you know about them?
